name: yowling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
yowl
to make a long, high, unhappy cry, usually when hurt or fighting: I was woken up by cats yowling outside my window. On the hills, the foxes yowled and yelped. Synonym
caterwaul
More examplesFewer examplesOutside in the road, a cat yowled.I keep hearing some kid yowling somewhere in the neighbourhood and thinking it's Sam.
